results.deck: A third-person action-adventure game set in the Bionicle universe. It is based on the 2002-2003 events of the Bionicle franchise but is considered non-canonical.
results.name: Bionicle

results.deck: Championship Manager 5 is the first game in the series to be solely developed by Eidos after Eidos and Sports Interactive split.
results.name: Championship Manager 5

results.deck: Take control of some of the many characters from Nick.  Each one has their own special power, can you master them all?
results.name: Nicktoons Unite!

results.deck: Ratatouille is a game based on the film of the same name.
results.name: Ratatouille

results.deck: The first episode in the Xenosaga trilogy released for the Playstation 2.
results.name: Xenosaga: Episode I - Der Wille zur Macht

results.deck: A platform adventure based on the ride at Disneyland, and thankfully, has nothing to do with the movie starring Eddie Murphy.
results.name: Disney's The Haunted Mansion

results.deck: After falling through a portal she discovered in her house, Kya is transported into a strange world. There, she encounters the Nativs, a tribe that is fighting against the evil Brazul and his minions. Can she help the Nativs in their fight and return safe to her world?
results.name: Kya: Dark Lineage

results.deck: "A City on the Brink of Disaster" welcomes heroic helicopter pilots as they rescue survivors, fight towering infernos, chase down fleeing felons, and take on the ultimate challenge: natural disasters.
results.name: City Crisis

results.deck: Dance Factory is a game in which you dance to your own music.
results.name: Dance Factory

results.deck: Smuggler's Run is a racing game developed by Angel Studios where the player takes on the role of a smuggler who must transport cargo while evading the authorities.
results.name: Smuggler's Run

results.deck: A video game prequel to Lilo & Stitch.
results.name: Disney's Stitch: Experiment 626

results.deck: Going from being a no-name racer to a international street-racing legend, Midnight Club II is an open-world, checkpoint-based street racing game where you drive a wide variety of cars and bikes through the streets of Los Angeles, Paris and Tokyo.
results.name: Midnight Club II

results.deck: Having inherited the mantle of Devil Summoner Raidou Kuzunoha, a young man goes to work at a detective agency and becomes involved in an occult conspiracy.
results.name: Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Summoner - Raidou Kuzunoha vs. the Soulless Army

results.deck: A handful of SNK's Neo-Geo games comprise this new collection for PlayStation 2, PSP, and Wii.
results.name: SNK Arcade Classics V.1

results.deck: Enter the six-sided ring and wrestle in Midway's first wrestling game from the Orlando-based TNA wrestling promotion.
results.name: TNA iMPACT!

results.deck: A reboot of the Alone in the Dark series, once again following Edward Carnby in his fight against the vile creatures of the darkness.
results.name: Alone in the Dark

results.deck: The first in a series of 2D fighting games with all-anime girl rosters.
results.name: Arcana Heart

results.deck: The first game in the Burnout series, 'Burnout' set the platform for a new generation of racing games, with a focus on speed, extravagant crashes, and a goal of driving as recklessly as possible.
results.name: Burnout

results.deck: Play Sudoku with Carol Vorderman.
results.name: Carol Vorderman's Sudoku

results.deck: Harvey Birdman: Attorney at Law is a game based on Adult Swim's TV show of  the same name.
results.name: Harvey Birdman: Attorney at Law

results.deck: The classic Marvel superhero Iron Man steps into the world of video games in his own game based on the hit blockbuster film.
results.name: Iron Man

results.deck: Take control of Indiana Jones and play through the first three original films, Lego style!
results.name: LEGO Indiana Jones: The Original Adventures

results.deck: Monster Lab is a Wii and DS game developed by Backbone Entertainment. The game is described as "Pokemon meets Tim Burton". The player controls one of three professors in order to build their own monster out of a selection of 150 parts. It is set for release on November 4,2008.
results.name: Monster Lab

results.deck: EA Sports is back with NCAA March Madness 08, featuring Texas Freshamn Standout Kevin Durant on the cover.
results.name: NCAA March Madness 08

results.deck: kami is an action-adventure game in which you restore life and beauty to a world that has been taken over by malevolent beings through the power of celestial calligraphy techniques given to you by the gods.
results.name: kami

results.deck: The second game in the Petz series to be themed around cats.
results.name: Petz: Catz 2

results.deck: Phantasy Star Universe: Ambition of the Illuminus is the expansion pack for Phantasy Star Universe.  It was released as DLC for Xbox 360, and as a standalone disc on PC and PS2.
results.name: Phantasy Star Universe: Ambition of the Illuminous

results.deck: Classic Sega characters collide on the courts in this arcade-style tennis game.
results.name: Sega Superstars Tennis

results.deck: Shining Force EXA, the second game in the Shining Force series to be developed by Neverland, is more of an action RPG akin to Diablo than previous games in the series.
results.name: Shining Force EXA

results.deck: Sonic and the Babylon Rogues bust out their hoverboards once again, this time bearing the power to manipulate gravity during races.
results.name: Sonic Riders: Zero Gravity

results.deck: The Adventures of Darwin is a Real-Time Strategy Puzzle game in the mold of Pikmin or Lemmings, created by Vingt-et-un Systems for the PS2.
results.name: The Adventures of Darwin

results.deck: Sony Computer Entertainment Europe and Team 17 are responsible for this PSP installment of Lemmings.
results.name: Lemmings

results.deck: WipEout Pulse is the second WipEout game on the PSP platform, featuring all-new tracks, songs, updated graphics and HUDs, and new Infrastructure features such as custom ship skin editing (through the WipEout website) and a host of new Downloadable Content.
results.name: WipEout Pulse

results.deck: Set in between Star Wars Episodes III and IV, Force Unleashed casts the player as Darth Vader's secret apprentice tasked with hunting down the last of the Jedi Order.
results.name: Star Wars: The Force Unleashed

results.deck: Connect up to four PS2s on a LAN and enter the Party Zone with up to eight players.
results.name: Dance Dance Revolution X

results.deck: Kung Fu Panda tells the story of Po, a panda who is chosen to be the Dragon Warrior and the trials he faces on his hero's journey. This game features beat 'em- up elements as well as impressive graphics.
results.name: Kung Fu Panda

results.deck: Having unceremoniously flushed himself down the toilet into the sewers, Roddy teams up with Rita to find a way back home.
results.name: Flushed Away

results.deck: The fourth game in the Guitar Hero series adds drums and vocals to the mix, along with a music studio that you can use to create new tracks and share them online.
results.name: Guitar Hero World Tour

results.deck: WWE SmackDown! vs. RAW 2009 continues with its annual edition of the popular wrestling game with its tenth game. The 2009 edition puts additional focus on tag team wrestling, including a co-operative story mode.
results.name: WWE SmackDown! vs. RAW 2009

results.deck: This expanded edition of Persona 3 adds additional content and a continuation of the original game's storyline.
results.name: Shin Megami Tensei: Persona 3 FES

results.deck: Guitar Hero: Aerosmith puts the player in the shoes of "America's Greatest Rock and Roll Band" as they evolve from unknowns to rock superstars. In a guitar hero game dedicated to the band that is Aerosmith!
results.name: Guitar Hero: Aerosmith

results.deck: The first Power Pro baseball game released in North America lets you take on the role of a college player or a general manager. The stylized art style and RPG elements make this baseball game a unique experience.
results.name: MLB Power Pros

results.deck: MLB Power Pros 2008 is the second installment in the Power Pros series to be released in North America.
results.name: MLB Power Pros 2008

results.deck: With a script edited and approved by Dan Aykroyd and Harold Ramis, Ghostbusters: The Video Game is a sequel to the feature length films. Who ya gonna call? GHOSTBUSTERS!
results.name: Ghostbusters: The Video Game

results.deck: With an improved graphics engine, Lara Croft is back and is looking better than ever. This time around she'll be going on an adventure to find the sacred Mayan underworld of Xibalba in Southern Mexico.
results.name: Tomb Raider: Underworld

results.deck: Proving Ground took the Tony Hawk series to the East Coast while breaking skater classes down into three specific styles of play.
results.name: Tony Hawk's Proving Ground

results.deck: The sequel to the critically acclaimed Mercenaries: Playground of Destruction. Now set in war-torn Venezuela, the player again takes on contracts for various warring factions on a quest for payback.
results.name: Mercenaries 2: World in Flames

results.deck: Speed Rumbler puts you into an armed and armored car as you work your way through multiple enemy-filled levels. The player can also exit the vehicle and battle on foot. Ahead of its time, the game's combination of run & gun shooter with driving mechanics was a precursor to later action games like GTA.
results.name: Speed Rumbler

results.deck: Twenty years in the making, a new Madden arrives, this gridiron great allows you to showcase your skills in this annual tradition of football Americana.
results.name: Madden NFL 09

results.deck: Harmonix, MTV Games, and EA return with the sequel to Rock Band. Rock Band 2 ships with 84 on-disc songs, 20 free downloadable songs, compatibility with all DLC, and the ability to import most songs from the first Rock Band.
results.name: Rock Band 2

results.deck: Quantum of Solace is a first-person/third-person shooter based on the James Bond films Casino Royale and its sequel, Quantum of Solace.
results.name: Quantum of Solace

results.deck: Need for Speed: Undercover returns the franchise to the arcade-style open world gameplay found in NFS: Most Wanted and NFS: Carbon.
results.name: Need for Speed: Undercover

results.deck: Serve hot meals to customers in this Japan-only beef bowl simulator.
results.name: Yoshinoya

results.deck: Spider-Man: Web Of Shadows sees Spider-Man facing off against nemesis Venom and his army of Symbiotes with the help of both Marvel heroes and villains.
results.name: Spider-Man: Web of Shadows
Karaoke Revolution Presents American Idol Encore

results.deck: The Serpent King returns to take on the combined forces of the mightiest warriors from China and Japan's most turbulent periods.
results.name: Warriors Orochi 2

results.deck: Based on the Pixar animated film taking place seven hundred years into the future, Wall-e is about the last functioning robot on Earth in this adventure platformer.
results.name: Wall-E

results.deck: Based on the 2008 movie, players control the anti-hero, Griffin, in his quest to kill Paladins and avenge his parents' deaths.
results.name: Jumper: Griffin's Story

results.deck: UEFA Euro 2008 is the official video game of the UEFA Euro 2008 football championships. Developed by EA Canada, the game uses an improved version of the FIFA 08 engine.
results.name: UEFA Euro 2008

results.deck: The first Rock Band add-on pack brings 20 additional songs to platforms that aren't able to download new songs online.
results.name: Rock Band Track Pack Volume 1

results.deck: Dynasty Warriors 6 is the latest in a long line of Dynasty Warriors game. The missions are adapted from the 14th century novel Romance of The Three Kingdoms written by Luo Guanzhong.
results.name: Dynasty Warriors 6

results.deck: This sequel to Crash of the Titans takes jacking enemies to the next level by allowing you to level up the monster under your control.
results.name: Crash: Mind Over Mutant

results.deck: NBA Live 09 is the next installment in the popular basketball franchise from Electronic Arts.
results.name: NBA Live 09

results.deck: LEGO Batman: The Video Game is an action adventure platformer focused on the combination of the popular Batman universe and the continued licensing of Lego-styled video games.
results.name: LEGO Batman: The Videogame

results.deck: EA's 2009 entry in the Tiger Woods PGA Tour franchise.
results.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 09

results.deck: 2008's iteration of Sony's first-party exclusive baseball franchise brings the well-regarded gameplay into next-gen with new detailed textures, lifelike player faces, online leagues, weekly roster updates and more on Playstation 3, as well as scaled-back PSP and Playstation 2 versions.
results.name: MLB 08: The Show

results.deck: Space Chimps is based off of the 2008 movie with the same name.
results.name: Space Chimps

results.deck: 12th NCAA Football game in the NCAA football series and the 1st to have online dynasty mode and the new breakaway engine.
results.name: NCAA Football 09

results.deck: Enter Pimp City-Where bling is king & speed is everything!
results.name: Pimp My Ride

results.deck: EA Sports races in with another year of NASCAR Racing with NASCAR 09.
results.name: NASCAR 09

results.deck: A game featuring the character George of the cartoons and movie George of the Jungle.
results.name: George of the Jungle and the Search for the Secret

results.deck: An Expansion of Samurai Warriors 2, where new characters and new game modes are available.
results.name: Samurai Warriors 2: Xtreme Legends

results.deck: A spiritual successor to the Pocky & Rocky games of the 16-bit era, Heavenly Guardian is a shooter that follows the story of the snow maiden Sayuki in a quest to rid a curse from a human boy she loves.
results.name: Heavenly Guardian

results.deck: Major League Baseball is back with 2K Sports MLB 2K8, featuring new pitching controls and swing stick 2.0.
results.name: Major League Baseball 2K8

results.deck: "The Dog Island is a game from Yuke's which puts you on an Island with Dogs." -EB Games
results.name: The Dog Island

results.deck: Speed Racer: The Videogame is a blisteringly fast movie tie-in racing game on courses full of loops and huge jumps, in which you're able to attack the other racers. Two different games were made for the movie, one for Nintendo Wii and Playstation 2, the other for Nintendo DS.
results.name: Speed Racer: The Videogame

results.deck: The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian is adapted from the novel-adapted movie of the same name.
results.name: Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian

results.deck: Race in realistic environments with ATVs or Monster Trucks.
results.name: MX vs. ATV Untamed

results.deck: Another hunting game in the Cabela series
results.name: Cabela's Trophy Bucks

results.deck: The Incredible Hulk is a free roam, open world game, allowing the player to reek havoc on the streets of New York City while playing through the story of the movie.
results.name: The Incredible Hulk

results.deck: Cocoto and his friends go racing through five different worlds.
results.name: Cocoto Kart Racer

results.deck: Third and final installment of the Legend of Spyro trilogy. Spyro and Cynder team up to stop the Dark Master, Malefor, from destroying the world.
results.name: The Legend of Spyro: Dawn of the Dragon

results.deck: A motorbike racing game in which you tear around dirt tracks and go off sweet jumps.
results.name: Yamaha Supercross

results.deck: NBA 2K9 continues the 2K Sports line of NBA basketball games with its tenth installment.
results.name: NBA 2K9

results.deck: Ford Racing: Off Road is another game in the Ford Racing series, though features vehicles from Land Rover as well.
results.name: Ford Racing: Off Road

results.deck: Take control of Rick O'Conell in this third episode based on the upcoming motion picture of the Mummy.
results.name: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor

results.deck: Sequel to Cabela's Dangerous Hunts 2. Cabela's Dangerous Hunts 2009 promises to be more survival orientated that the previous two.
results.name: Cabela's Dangerous Hunts 2009

results.deck: NHL 2K9 is purported to be a refresh of the series, designed to be easy to pick-up-and-play with simplified controls; as was the first NHL licensed title on the Nintendo Wii.
results.name: NHL 2K9

results.deck: SBK-08: Superbike World Championship is the official game for the '08 Superbike World Championship season.
results.name: SBK: Superbike World Championship

results.deck: Ferrari Challenge lets you drive just about any car you want......as long as its a Ferrari. This time, the licensed Ferrari racing game adds weather effects, a livery editor, new tracks, and a new focus on the Challenge series of cars, mainly the F430.
results.name: Ferrari Challenge Trofeo Pirelli

results.deck: A collection of word games to challenge your brain.
results.name: Margot's Word Brain
